chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: Serenla Min, p. 42 (33)—Name Min adopts while traveling. It means “stubborn daughter” in the Old Tongue. The last name was a mistake; when Gareth Bryne asked for her name, Min spat out her real name, and that was how she corrected it. See Farshaw, Elmindreda.
